nodes.text: The Nikto Kajidic, roughly meaning "Nikto prosper by this", was an Imperial Customs Frigate that saw service during the time of Galactic Civil War.

When the Nikto Ga'p'tashi agreed to become a privateer for the Tenloss Syndicate, they assisted him in acquiring an Imperial Customs Frigate, which he named the Nikto Kajidic. After assembling a crew and disrupting a number of smuggling operations, Ga'p'tashi took the ship to the Si'Klaata Cluster, where he began using it to attack the Hutts and the Vodrans.
The Kajidic was commanded by Ga'p'tashi and its crew was made up of Niktos and Klatooinians.
